title: Did the rescue of Beta Lobster in Nebraska kill the captured creatures?
subtitle: According to rumors, "people for moral treatment of animals" accidentally killed lobsters who rescued them by firing them into fresh water, instead of salt water.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: People for the moral treatment of animals (PETA) "Save" a number of lobsters went to dinner dishes before killing them all immediately by firing them into the deadly fresh water in Nebraska.
